original_query: SELECT pl.PostId, v.PostId FROM comments as c, postLinks as pl, postHistory as ph, votes as v WHERE pl.PostId = c.PostId AND c.PostId = ph.PostId AND ph.PostId = v.PostId AND ph.CreationDate>=CAST('2014-05-07 21:47:19' AS TIMESTAMP) AND ph.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-10 13:19:54' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT posthistory.postid AS E3_postid FROM posthistory AS posthistory WHERE posthistory.creationdate >= TIMESTAMP '2014-05-07 21:47:19' AND posthistory.creationdate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-10 13:19:54'
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT votes.postid AS E4_postid FROM votes AS votes
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3_stage1_0 AS SELECT * FROM E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E3.E3_postid=E4.E4_postid)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT postlinks.postid AS E2_postid FROM postlinks AS postlinks
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3_stage1_1 AS SELECT * FROM E3_stage1_0 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E3_stage1_0.E3_postid=E2.E2_postid)
CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT comments.postid AS E1_postid FROM comments AS comments
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3_stage1_2 AS SELECT * FROM E3_stage1_1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E1 WHERE E3_stage1_1.E3_postid=E1.E1_postid)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E4_stage2_0 AS SELECT * FROM E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3_stage1_2 WHERE E3_stage1_2.E3_postid=E4.E4_postid)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2_stage2_0 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3_stage1_2 WHERE E3_stage1_2.E3_postid=E2.E2_postid)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1_stage2_0 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3_stage1_2 WHERE E3_stage1_2.E3_postid=E1.E1_postid)

CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E_stage3 AS SELECT E4_stage2_0.E4_postid AS E4_postid, E2_stage2_0.E2_postid AS E2_postid FROM E3_stage1_2, E4_stage2_0, E2_stage2_0, E1_stage2_0 WHERE E3_stage1_2.E3_postid=E4_stage2_0.E4_postid AND E3_stage1_2.E3_postid=E2_stage2_0.E2_postid AND E3_stage1_2.E3_postid=E1_stage2_0.E1_postid
